Here is the list of signs and their scores:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Passionate and impulsive, but also reckless.
2. Taurus - 7/10 - Reliable and practical, but can be stubborn.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, but can be scattered.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Emotional and nurturing, but overly sensitive.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, but also prideful.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but perfectionistic.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Diplomatic and social, but indecisive.
8. Scorpio - 8/10 - Passionate and intense, but also secretive.
9. Sagittarius - 9/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but also blunt.
10. Capricorn - 7/10 - Disciplined and responsible, but also serious.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but also unconventional.
12. Pisces - 6/10 - Compassionate and imaginative, but also dreamy.
Note: The scores are subjective and based on common astrological characteristics associated with each sign.
